figure-caption: "Defining operational semantics for diagrammatic languages using querying and mapping. Queries select constructs from a diagram. Selected constructs are mapped to one or more Construct Agent B-threads (CABs). Run together
column4: those CABs generate a valid execution of the original program."

figure-caption: "LSC describing a basic move in a card memory game. After the user clicks two cards
column5: and the two cards are compared. If the cards are different
column6: they are flipped back down. The click method shows the cardsâ€™ faces
column7: and the flipDown method turns them over again. The first two events may or may not happen
column8: are thus cold (blue). The ensuing three events must happen once the first two events have
column9: and are thus hot (red). The Sync construct forces the Beep to occur after the second click."
